structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: It is the intent of KRS 68.520 to 68.550 to provide to counties within the Commonwealth of Kentucky, subject to the provisions for election set forth in KRS 68.520 to 68.550, additional revenues for public service programs through voted levies of ad valorem taxes and license taxes.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 347, sec. 1.
